channel.title: Comments on: 10 Questions with Apologies to Bernard Pivot & James Lipton

item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/04/25/10-questions-with-apologies-to-bernard-pivot-james-lipton-16/#comment-659">Aira Lipson</a>.
Looks great!

item.title: By: Ariel Deardorff
item.dc:creator: Ariel Deardorff
item.description: Aira I just got back from Zion National Park and it was amazing! I would definitely recommend you go :)
item.content:encoded: Aira I just got back from Zion National Park and it was amazing! I would definitely recommend you go ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Aira Lipson
item.dc:creator: Aira Lipson
item.description: Hi Jason. La Palma is a Mexicatessen in the Mission- http://www.lapalmasf.com/ Their rice is cooked to perfection for you. They are well know for their amazing fresh tortillas and chicharrones. I highly recommend checking them out if you like Mexican food.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jason. La Palma is a Mexicatessen in the Mission- http://www.lapalmasf.com/
Their rice is cooked to perfection for you. They are well know for their amazing fresh tortillas and chicharrones. I highly recommend checking them out if you like Mexican food.

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: Hi Aira! Thanks for sharing! Perhaps you could expand on this "La Palma's Rice" dish you mentioned? Is that a specific recipe? Or from a restaurant, perhaps? Or is it a type of rice you can purchase and cook? just wondering! Also, good call on the nail-clipping Muni/BART passengers! Cutting nails on public transpo (heard OR seen!) is so gross!
item.content:encoded: Hi Aira! Thanks for sharing! Perhaps you could expand on this “La Palma’s Rice” dish you mentioned? Is that a specific recipe? Or from a restaurant, perhaps? Or is it a type of rice you can purchase and cook? just wondering! Also, good call on the nail-clipping Muni/BART passengers! Cutting nails on public transpo (heard OR seen!) is so gross!
